abstract: Bostonians reflect on end of city's bid to host 2024 Summer Olympics; some feel sense of relief that city will avoid impact of games, while others bemoan missed opportunity to initiate long-term development plan.
lead_paragraph: The elimination of Boston’s 2024 Summer Games bid left residents reflecting on whether the city was too small-minded or too smart to be taken in by promises of Olympic riches.

headline.main: Many in Boston Feel Relief as Olympic Bid Ends, but Others See a Stagnant City
headline.print_headline: Many in Boston Feel Relief as Olympic Bid Ends, but Others See a Stagnant City

snippet: The elimination of Boston’s 2024 Summer Games bid left residents reflecting on whether the city was too small-minded or too smart to be taken in by promises of Olympic riches.
